review.title: “job experience at klite fm”
review.pros: Pros – the working environment is good.the work is easy. you get to have freebies from sponsors-this includes free tickets for concerts or shows, gift cards and other stuffs.they have friendly dj's and staff.
review.cons: Cons – everything seems to be right except for the salary. although when it comes to broadcasting companies you can't actually expect a high salary. shifting schedules can't be avoided.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – they should be lenient enough but not to compromise their standards in working.
